content: @Grahame Grieve Who do I need to get in contact with in order to get a new repo created under the HL7 Org on github? We're about to start up a new IG under the DK affiliate and it will be focused on the primary and secondary sector message based communications exchange. I need to be set up as manager and the repo needs to be named dk-medcom-core-r4 meaning that the full URL should be https://github.com/hl7/dk-medcom-core-r4
could it be @David Johnson or @Lloyd McKenzie ?
our usual process is that the affiliates have and manage their own github repository if it's not USA (since that's not an affiliate). See e.g. https://github.com/hl7au https://github.com/hl7ch
if that's not practical, I can look into it
@Grahame Grieve please look into it
or wait ... I'll make the transition to a hl7dk affiliate then
@Grahame Grieve whats the process for using the IG build pipeline for affiliate IG's?
anyone can use the IG build pipeline
if you are asking about the CI-build specifically: https://github.com/FHIR/auto-ig-builder/blob/master/README.md
